channel.title: the last on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in the last on Barefoot Rob

item.title: book review The Last
item.description: 17:45 Sunday 03 May 2015 JST I just finished Mike’s latest book, The Last. It’s a really interesting story set in the real world, just three years from now. Quite an easy read except for the queasy parts which I almost had to put down! The story leaves some unanswered questions, and lends itself to more books, which I hope he writes soon! I was surprised by the plot twists; it seemed so simple at first!
